title.rendered: 30 pairs of snow boots, 40 pairs of sneakers, toys and clothes for children in a rehabilitation center in Chernihiv Region.

content.rendered: Our Ukrainian volunteers have delivered over 30 pairs of snow boots and 40 pairs of sneakers to the children of rehabilitation center in Budyshe Village, a remote area in Chernihiv Region. Thanks to our supporters who contributed to this fundraiser, kids will have warm feet in the cold winter!!! All children also received new winter coats, clothes, hats, and toys purchased by many of you during the “Christmas Gifts for Ukrainian Kids” drive initiated by United Help Ukraine. There were additional 4 large boxes of new and like-new clothes and toys collected, sorted, packed and shipped by UHU volunteers. We still have money left to purchase rain boots and will update you once this shipment is complete. Again and again – YOUR HELP and SUPPORT is greatly appreciated, especially by the little ones who have never seen such nice things.
